casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kevlin W. SELLARS 64P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kelvin W. Sellars, for Sellars, Kelvin W. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of March 2018 by Defendant for Discretionary Review: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of March 2018." Ervin, J. recused
